column4: Does upgrading from one Ubuntu version like 11.04, to 12.04 made anything backwards incompatible/break anything?
if by upgrading 11.04 to 12.04 you mean editing the sources and changing the release codename in those to precice, yes it will break soon or later and it's also not supported here
is that the same as using the update manager to upgrade to 12.04? I'm not sure what you mean
